title: I found my Essence Collector Ward was last on my account
body: I found my Essence Collector Ward was last on my account. On 9th November, I spent 6000  blue essence(that is a lot ) to buy this ward. But now I can not find it. Is it a BUG or what? Can you give me an explain? Thank you very much.{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body:
There's not much that we can do here for you TBH, our power is very limited for this kind of stuff. Your best bet it to get in touch with Riot [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and ask them what happened to your ward. 

I recommend you use the _"I have a question about blue essence conversion or rewards"_ category.
